thread.title: Festive Bengali DIY look: Glam up with this Durga Puja makeup tutorial!
thread.title_full: Festive Bengali DIY look: Glam up with this Durga Puja makeup tutorial!

author: Priya Prakashan
title: Festive Bengali DIY look: Glam up with this Durga Puja makeup tutorial!
text:
Festive Bengali DIY look: Glam up with this Durga Puja makeup tutorial! By Priya Prakashan on October 20, 2015 at 4:05 PM Comments 
Jai Durga! When the people are immersed in happiness and joy this festive season, don’t you want to stand out from the rest of the people? Well, this DIY Durga Puja and Navratri makeup video will help you with your brand new festive look. The video blogger Debasree Banerjee helps you achieve a very festive Bengali makeup look. Watch the video and give it a try to look special during the Durga Puja festivities. 
Go ahead and adorn the traditional look this festive season. Deck up and enjoy the electrifying season of Durga Puja on all the days. Be it Mahalaya, Shashthi, Maha Saptami, Maha Ashtami, Maha Nabami or Vijayadashami, you can try the look with little changes. (ALSO READ: Durga Puja 2015: Mamata Banerjee pens Maa Go Tumi Sarbojonin on the auspicious occasion of the Navratri) 
Let go of your inhibitions, you need not worry if the huge bindi on your forehead or the brightest hue on your lips will suit you or not. Set the base of your makeup in a prim and proper way, focus on a dramatic eye makeup along with a red bindi and bright red lipstick. (ALSO READ: India’s first transgender Durga Puja idol in Kolkata is breaking stereotypes in Navratri 2015! ) 
Ethnic jewelry along with the traditional attire will complete your look.Watch the YouTube video below and follow the Durga Puja makeup tutorial to look your best this festive season. We wish you and your family a very happy Durga Pujo! 
  4:05 PM Topics:
